sentences.en: As with all dietary changes, reducing salt should be done gradually.
sentences.cn: 像所有改变饮食结构的情况一样，减少盐的摄入量也应当采取渐进的方式。

sentences.en: Gradually he began to acknowledge his feelings of envy towards his mother.
sentences.cn: 渐渐地，他开始承认自己羡慕母亲。

sentences.en: Gradually, with an intelligent use of flashbacks, Yves' story unravels.
sentences.cn: 通过巧妙运用倒叙手法，伊夫的故事慢慢呈现出来。

sentences.en: He gradually relaxed his grip on the arms of the chair.
sentences.cn: 他紧握椅子扶手的手逐渐松开了。

sentences.en: He has gradually acquiesced to the demands of the opposition.
sentences.cn: 他渐渐顺从了反对派的要求。

sentences.en: I gradually got rather disillusioned with the whole setup of the university.
sentences.cn: 渐渐地，我对大学的整个体制感到相当失望。

sentences.en: In the union office, the mood gradually changed from resignation to rage.
sentences.cn: 在工会办公室，情绪慢慢从顺从转变成愤怒。

sentences.en: Jill gradually became aware of an awful smell.
sentences.cn: 吉尔渐渐地闻到了一股难闻的气味。

sentences.en: Non-state firms gradually elbow aside the inefficient state-owned ones.
sentences.cn: 非国有企业逐渐挤掉了效率低下的国有企业。

sentences.en: Sound him out gradually. Make sure it is what he really wants.
sentences.cn: 要慢慢地打探他的口风，要确保是他的心里话。

sentences.en: The diamond towns are gradually being reclaimed by the desert.
sentences.cn: 这些钻石城镇正逐渐重归沙漠。

sentences.en: The tidal stream or current gradually decreases in the shallows.
sentences.cn: 浅滩上的潮水逐渐退去。

sentences.en: Try gradually to quiet them down as bedtime approaches.
sentences.cn: 临近就寝的时候，要尽量让他们渐渐安静下来。

sentences.en: We are gradually changing over to a completely metric system.
sentences.cn: 我们正逐渐过渡到完全使用公制。

sentences.en: We can build up the speed gradually and safely.
sentences.cn: 我们可以逐渐稳妥地提高速度。

sentences.en: Work the oil gradually into the yolks with a wooden spoon.
sentences.cn: 用木勺将油慢慢掺到蛋黄中。

trans.tran_en: slowly, over a long period of time
